knimeNode.name: OPS Description
knimeNode.shortDescription: Download the description of a patent.

fullDescription.intro: Uses the ops.epo.org service to download the description of a patent, given its country/docnumber/kind code. Supports OAuth2 authentication, if the user has a valid consumer key and consumer secret.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The Patent ID consisting of Country.DocNumber.Kind (docdb format).
